meanings.definition: A toxic organophosphate compound used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use parathions to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent2: The parathions sprayed on the fields helped control the pest population.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous insects played a prank by switching the labels on the parathions bottles.
meanings.sent4: The effect of the parathions on the insects was like a powerful spell cast by a wizard.
meanings.sent5: The smell of parathions lingered in the air, a warning of its potent toxicity.
